content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array at positions (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (1, 1)
- Stone furnace at position (3, 0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt before inserting items. Check the inventory of the furnaces to avoid inserting items when they are full or have no ingredients.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to check the status of the furnaces before extracting items. If the furnaces are empty or have no items to extract, it will lead to unnecessary actions.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
